channel.title: Pk point rewards = pc points reward?
channel.description: well, i saw a tutorial for a pk reward system where went you went to the music list you can exchange your pk points for rewards, is there a way to make it so that you make it a pc reward system? you spend pc points for prizes does anyone know how to do that, thanks
